nodes.text: Rath was a pale-skinned, emaciated humanoid underdweller of a indeterminate species. He broke into the Solos' apartment on Coruscant, under the orders of an IT-3 Interrogator droid, stealing Leia Organa Solo's data pad, which contained highly sensitive information on the New Republic. In a secret Imperial detention center in the city's lower levels, he and his partner were knocked unconscious by Chewbacca.
